document_data.caption: Map showing Gothal Street (center).
document_data.name: Gothal Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Gothal Street''' was a minor street in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Geography: Gothal Street ran between the thoroughfares [[Calamastyr Lane]] and [[Julthoon Street]], and was crossed by [[Trader's Way (Waterdeep)|Trader's Way]].

Notable Locations.Links to Sewers: An entrance to the [[sewers of Waterdeep]] could be found where Gothal Street met Calamastyr Lane.
